tool_description: Sends temperature alerts and compliance notifications to appropriate personnel via multiple communication channels.

alert_id.description: Unique identifier of alert to dispatch

recipient_roles.description: Target roles: kitchen_manager, food_safety_officer, shift_supervisor, maintenance_tech

communication_channels.description: Delivery methods: email, sms, app_push, dashboard_alert, pager

escalation_enabled.description: Whether to escalate if no acknowledgment received

error_messages: Invalid alert_id: Alert identifier not found or format incorrect.
Invalid recipient_roles: Must include at least one of [kitchen_manager, food_safety_officer, shift_supervisor, maintenance_tech].
Invalid communication_channels: Must include at least one of [email, sms, app_push, dashboard_alert, pager].
Dispatch failed: Unable to send notification via any specified channel.
Recipients unavailable: No active personnel found matching specified roles.
usage: Provide alert_id and specify recipient_roles and communication_channels arrays. Enable escalation_enabled for critical alerts requiring acknowledgment.

dispatch_id.description: Unique identifier for this notification dispatch

delivery_status.description: Status for each delivery attempt: sent, failed, pending
